special_abilities.Two More Shall Take Its Place (Special): When Hydra Agent is KO'd, after resolutions you may heal 1 click on up to two friendly characters that have Hydra team ability.

special_abilities.A New Rider to Play With (Damage): Perplex, Outwit. Once per turn when Ghost Goblin uses either to target an opposing character, after resolutions he may deal 1 damage to an opposing character adjacent to the targeted character.

special_abilities.Please, We're Partners Now (Special): SIDELINE ACTIVE - When a character leaves a Sideline, after resolutions you may generate Mephisto from your Sideline adjacent to that character, even if he wasn't placed on your Sideline for this effect. If that character was opposing, Mephisto has Immune until your next turn. // Mephisto can't be included on your Sideline during force construction.
special_abilities.The Eternal Evil (Special): When Mephisto is KO'd, add him to your Sideline instead of removing him from the game, even if he previously left your Sideline for a different effect. (He is still scored.) Protected: Pulse Wave.
special_abilities.Forming a Team of Our Own (Special): Once per turn, when another character leaves a Sideline, after resolutions you may heal 1 click on a friendly character or remove an action token from a friendly character. If the character that left a Sideline has the Masters of Evil keyword, you may choose both.
special_abilities.Team-Up: Masters of Evil, Ruler (Special: If Mephisto is on a listed themed team, when he would be dealt damage from an attack he may instead choose another friendly character within range and line of fire. If he does, that character takes one unavoidable damage.
special_abilities.Team-Up: Masters of Evil, Monster (Speci: If Mephisto is on a listed themed team, when a standard character is KO'd you may heal a friendly character 1 click.
special_abilities.Team-Up: Deity, Mystical (Special): If Mephisto is on a listed themed team, when a friendly character within range and line of fire makes an attack Mephisto may replace a die in that roll with a 6. If he does, after resolutions deal Mephisto 1 unavoidable damage.

special_abilities.I'm Not the Worst Avenger (Special): If Hawkeye is the lowest point character on your force, he can't be targeted by non-adjacent opposing characters. // If Hawkeye is on an Avengers themed team, modify his combat values +1.

special_abilities.Leading the Charge (Special): Leadership, Willpower. When Captain America uses either power to remove an action token from a friendly character, after resolutions choose one:*Heal that character 1 click*Remove an additional action token from that character (that does not trigger this trait).
special_abilities.Listen Up, Avengers! (Special): Friendly characters with the Avengers keyword that have no action tokens have SAFEGUARD: Outwit.

special_abilities.Extremis 3.0 (Special): Perplex.
